analysisEngineMetaData.name: hw2-chens1-scnlp-local
analysisEngineMetaData.description:
This descriptor simplies calls the local classes of org.cleartk.stanford.StanfordCoreNLPAnnotator which has been added to our my service. This is used as a test to compare the remote NLP and local NLP running time, and as a result we can get a hint on which part is a better solution/approach to call the service properly.
After running this, there might be more java classes available to use as has been tested on my machine.
